name: Development
description: General software development tools and workflows

commands.name: Init Project npm
commands.description: Creates a new Node.js project with npm initialization. Creates a directory with the specified name and initializes it as an npm package. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Install Dependencies npm
commands.description: Installs a specific npm package. Adds the specified package to your project dependencies. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Run Script npm
commands.description: Runs a specific npm script defined in package.json. Executes the script with the specified name. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Build Project npm
commands.description: Builds the project using npm build script. Compiles and prepares the project for production. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Run Tests npm
commands.description: Runs all tests defined in your project using npm. Useful for verifying code correctness. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Lint Code npm
commands.description: Checks your code for style and programming errors using the linter defined in your project. Requires Node.js, npm, and a linter (like ESLint) to be installed.

commands.name: Format Code npm
commands.description: Automatically formats your code using the formatter defined in your project (e.g., Prettier). Requires Node.js, npm, and a formatter to be installed.

commands.name: Watch Mode npm
commands.description: Starts the development server in watch mode, automatically rebuilding on file changes. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Debug Mode npm
commands.description: Runs the project in debug mode for troubleshooting and step-by-step execution. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Clean Install npm
commands.description: Removes node_modules and lock file, then reinstalls all dependencies. Useful for fixing dependency issues. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Update Dependencies npm
commands.description: Updates all project dependencies to their latest versions using npm. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Audit Security npm
commands.description: Performs a security audit of your project's dependencies using npm. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Check Outdated npm
commands.description: Checks for outdated npm packages in your project. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Publish Package npm
commands.description: Publishes your npm package to the npm registry. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed, and you must be logged in to npm.

commands.name: Bump Version npm
commands.description: Increments the version number of your npm package. Useful for release management. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Init Repository git
commands.description: Initializes a new Git repository, adds all files, and creates the first commit. Requires Git to be installed.
commands.command: git init && git add . && git commit -m "Initial commit"

commands.name: Create README file
commands.description: Creates a README.md file in your project. Useful for adding project documentation.

commands.name: Create LICENSE file
commands.description: Creates a LICENSE file in your project. Useful for specifying the license of your code.

commands.name: Create .gitignore file
commands.description: Creates a .gitignore file in your project. Useful for specifying files and folders to be ignored by Git.

commands.name: Create .env files
commands.description: Creates .env and .env.example files for environment variables. Useful for managing configuration in different environments.

commands.name: Create App Tauri
commands.description: Creates a new Tauri application using cargo. Requires Rust and Tauri CLI to be installed. Install: https://tauri.app/v1/guides/getting-started/prerequisites/

commands.name: Dev Mode Tauri
commands.description: Runs the Tauri application in development mode. Requires Rust and Tauri CLI to be installed.

commands.name: Add Autostart Tauri
commands.description: Adds autostart functionality to your Tauri app. Requires Rust and Tauri CLI to be installed.

commands.name: Build App Tauri
commands.description: Builds the Tauri application for production. Requires Rust and Tauri CLI to be installed.

commands.name: Clone Repository Git
commands.description: Clones a remote Git repository to your local machine. Requires Git to be installed.

commands.name: Pull Changes Git
commands.description: Pulls the latest changes from the main branch of the remote repository. Requires Git to be installed.

commands.name: Push Changes Git
commands.description: Pushes your local commits to the main branch of the remote repository. Requires Git to be installed.

commands.name: Create Branch Git
commands.description: Creates a new branch in your Git repository. Requires Git to be installed.

commands.name: Merge Branch Git
commands.description: Merges the specified branch into the current branch in your Git repository. Requires Git to be installed.

commands.name: Install Dependencies Yarn
commands.description: Installs all dependencies using Yarn. Requires Node.js and Yarn to be installed.

commands.name: Add Package Yarn
commands.description: Adds a package to your project dependencies using Yarn. Requires Node.js and Yarn to be installed.

commands.name: Install Dependencies pnpm
commands.description: Installs all dependencies using pnpm. Requires Node.js and pnpm to be installed.

commands.name: Install Dependencies Bun
commands.description: Installs all dependencies using Bun. Requires Bun to be installed. Install: https://bun.sh/docs/install

commands.name: Compose Up Docker
commands.description: Starts all services defined in docker-compose.yml in detached mode. Requires Docker and Docker Compose to be installed.

commands.name: Run Container Docker
commands.description: Runs a Docker container in detached mode with the specified name and image. Requires Docker to be installed.

commands.name: Exec Container Docker
commands.description: Executes a shell inside a running Docker container. Requires Docker to be installed.

commands.name: Run Package npx
commands.description: Runs a package using npx without installing it globally. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Fix Security npm
commands.description: Automatically fixes security vulnerabilities in your npm dependencies. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.

commands.name: Check Outdated npm
commands.description: Checks for outdated npm packages in your project. Requires Node.js and npm to be installed.
